original_text: I have never kept all my food for myself. I have always shared it with children who have no family. I have never kept all my food for myself.
korean_text: 나만 혼자 내 떡덩이를 먹고 고아에게 그 조각을 먹이지 아니하였던가

sentences.original_text: I have never kept all my food for myself.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 결코 내 음식 전부를 나 혼자 간직하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: I have always shared it with children
I have never kept all my food for myself.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 결코 내 음식 전부를 나 혼자 간직하지 않았다.
